feed.title: Toberakâ€™s Projects
feed.subtitle: Toberak is renowned for founding GDT, an organization for esports events on Discord with official support, focused on Badland Brawl. He has also partnered with Matcherino to enhance crowdfunding and has become a key figure in the development of esports events on an international scale. His ability to organize exciting and fun events has made a significant impact on the gaming community worldwide.

entry.title: NSL - Awards History
entry.content:
No Sweat League

Since 2020 creating Competitive events in @ClashRoyale

We have experience in organizing friendly and inclusive global events since August 2020. Now we are here to continue growing together with you. We also partner with multilingual collaborators to bring amazing events, for the community, by the community.

This is a Clash Royale esports league

Youtube Discord Twitter

entry.title: Welcome to Jekyll!
entry.content:
Youâ€™ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.

Jekyll requires blog post files to be named according to the following format:

YEAR-MONTH-DAY-title.MARKUP

Where YEAR is a four-digit number, MONTH and DAY are both two-digit numbers, and MARKUP is the file extension representing the format used in the file. After that, include the necessary front matter. Take a look at the source for this post to get an idea about how it works.

Jekyll also offers powerful support for code snippets:

Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyllâ€™s GitHub repo. If you have questions, you can ask them on Jekyll Talk.
entry.summary: Youâ€™ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.

link.title: Toberakâ€™s projects in GDT (need to fix html and css format)

entry.content:
Since 2019 until 2022 building the eSport escene for @BadlandBrawl
We began humbly competing among friends, to reach, over more than two years, international competitions with more than 1500 participants, along the way acquiring partnerships with developers and with the largest crowdfunding organization of eSports Matcherino, being successful in each event.
This is a Badland Brawl esports leagues, tournaments, competitions, events and challenges

Discord

Twitter

Always attentive to what the community suggested, we knew how to position ourselves as the main events for all levels of players.
Beginners compete with beginners through our revolutionary category system.
Weekly challenges and tournaments, competitions for combos, team leagues, raffles and more!

Youtube

Instagram

Facebook

</div></div>
